title: American Sociological Review - Does Intra-household Contagion Cause an Increase in Prescription Opioid Use?
description: Co-author Mathijs de Vaan discusses his article, co-authored by Toby Stuart, "Does Intra-household Contagion Cause an Increase in Prescription Opioid Use?," published in the August 2019 is of the American Sociological Review.
